verbs.description: sweet n sour beans [ARG1: this recipe] [V: is] [ARG2: popular on both sides of the border] it came from a friend in alaska then traveled with me to old mexico where i lived for 5 years and is now a potluck favorite in my arkansas community it easy to keep the beans warm and serve from a slow cooker -barbara short mena arkansas onemain financial services food news rda enthusiast brands mexico alaska magazine customer service lima beans mena arkansas arkansas s digest cook partner america mena
